page.title: 04THE HERB GARDEN PLUMLEY
page.content: THE AREA AROUND PLUMLEY CONSISTS MAINLY OF OPEN FIELDS WITH FINE FARM HOUSES AND OLD COTTAGES.MANY OF THESE COTTAGES HAVE BEEN RENOVATED BY HIGHLY PAID PROFESSIONAL PEOPLE WHO COMMUTE INTO THE BIGGER TOWNS AND CITIES EACH DAY. THE GLEAVE FAMILY LIVE IN ONE OF THESE COTTAGES.MR GLEAVE IS A CANCER SURGEON IN ONE OF THE MAIN MANCHESTER HOSPITALS.LAURA,THE DAUGHTER,ALSO TRAVELS FIFTEEN MILES EACH DAY TO SCHOOL,WHILE MRS GLEAVE GROWS HERBS VERY SERIOUSLY IN THEIR VAST GARDEN. THE HERBS ARE HOUSED IN A HUGE PLASTIC GREENHOUSE GIVING OUT FRESH,VARIED SMELLS.THE HERBS ARE SOLD TO NURSERIES WHO IN TURN SELL THEM TO THE PUBLIC FOR MEDICINES,DYES,AROMATIC PURPOSES,FOOD FLAVOURING AND DECORATION.
